pages.text: $(#FFFF55)TREPIDATION is a roguelike$(#551012), meaning that $(#FFFF55)resetting and starting new runs$(#551012) is expected and encouraged.$(br2)You can reset a run by clicking the $(#FFFF55)Reset Run button$(#551012) on the pause menu.

$(#551012)You may have noticed a timer at the bottom left of your screen ticking down.$(br2)$(bold)Once at 0:00, you will be $(obf)sent to Limbo for an unknown amount of time, where there will be no escape$()$(#551012). $(br2)Failing a run will unlock new content and lore.$(#551012)$(br2)------------------------------------>
$(#551012)You are given a few $(#FFFF55)Chrono Usurpations$(#551012) throughout your run, which will add more time to your timer.$()
